summary: This is a new HD retextered version of this sword. I manually replaced every texture.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod ever, in all my life. Put my two years worth of shop knowledge to work. I\'ve re-textured everything on this sword at 1024px resolution. If anyone\'s interested in a higher resolution version, drop it the comments. I\'ll create one. Do the same, if you think something should be changed. Or you find any bugs.

I hope you like it. :)

Note:
The After screenshot dds, texture at the bottom of the sword looks harsh in the picture shown. This is not the case in game, because the middle is covered by a different texture. See the in game shots for how the end result looks.


For those who want a re-texture, more to the original vanilla concept. While keeping the texture of the sword blade. You can find that here. I allowed Yushatak to modify my retexture.
Here\'s a comparison screen.
[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/4250-1-1324889941.jpg[/img]
If you like his, here\'s the link.
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4605

**Installation**
This is compatible with the Mod Manager.
But manual installation is as follows.
. extract the .rar file to your skyrim\\data folder.

**For those with existing weapons packs**
This is also compatible with installed weapons packs. All you have to do is say yes to override \'dawnbreaker.dds\', and it will only replace \'this sword\'. All the others in the installed pack will remain.

______________________________________________________________________
Updates :
Version 1.1
Fixed an issue with the seam between the two sword pieces.
______________________________________________________________________

I didn\'t make my own textures for this.
Credits go to the following, they allow use of their texture. Provided credit is given, of course.

Glass/stone design : http://texturez.com/
Metal Design : wojtar-stock -- http://wojtar-stock.deviantart.com/art/metal-texture-1-59995009
Gold Metal Design WanderingSoul-Stox -- http://wanderingsoul-stox.deviantart.com/art/Texture-71-Gold-62136835?q=boost%3Apopular+sky+texture&qo=7 -- 
Leather Texture : http://webtreats.mysitemyway.com/free-tileable-leather-patterns/
Copper Texture : http://www.flickr.com/photos/22651312@N04/3868689555/
author: Drowned Soul
